name: Fix The Connections: Cell Fusion
description:
*Warning*: Music might be a bit loud. You may want to turn down your volume.

Audio by Jorava, Graphics by LineartLemur

Original game by Taft Punk

Play the original game here: https://taftpunk.itch.io/fix-the-connections

Submission to Shape Jam 2 Part 2 by 8 Bit Infinity: https://itch.io/jam/shape-jam-ii-part-2

The idea of Shape Jam 2 Part 2 was to add graphics and audio to a game made by different people in Part 1.

Controls: Click with mouse. Esc to quit (in desktop version).

Mac/Linux versions untested, hope they work!
